description: This file defines the top-level routing configuration for a Learning Management System (LMS) frontend application built with React. It sets up various routes, including public, protected, and admin-only paths, and includes components for dashboards, course lists, course content, and authentication pages.

methods.name: AppRoutes()
methods.description: Defines the main routing component for the LMS application, rendering various routes based on URL paths, with protected routes for authenticated users and role-based access for admin dashboards.

methods.name: Unauthorized
methods.description: Component rendering an unauthorized access message.

methods.name: PathsPage
methods.description: Component displaying the list of learning paths.

methods.name: CoursesByPath
methods.description: Component showing courses associated with a specific learning path, utilizing URL parameter 'id'.
